response.original_title: 田中音楽堂オトナLive 2020「歌學革命宴」 feat.鈴木文学堂
response.overview: Acoustic guitar live song broadcasting that Hime Tanaka suddenly started live broadcasting  "Tanaka Ongakudo" is now a real live show!  The theme this time is "Adult".  A big change from the 1st one-man live "Scream your heart"  With a slightly mature atmosphere,  I would like to deliver wonderful music.  The performance is performed live by the band. Rumor has it that they will be performing some new songs as well! ?  It is a live broadcast that is usually done only by Hime,  This time Hina will come to sing a little too.  What exactly is Suzuki Bungakudo? ? ?  Ladies and Gentlemen Joji, Ladies and Gentlemen, we look forward to your visit.
response.title: 田中音楽堂オトナLive 2020「歌學革命宴」 feat.鈴木文学堂
